# **geosapi**

[![Build
Status](https://github.com/eblondel/geosapi/actions/workflows/r-cmd-check.yml/badge.svg?branch=master)](https://github.com/eblondel/geosapi/actions/workflows/r-cmd-check.yml)
[![CRAN_Status_Badge](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/geosapi)](https://cran.r-project.org/package=geosapi)
[![cran
checks](https://badges.cranchecks.info/worst/geosapi.svg)](https://cran.r-project.org/web/checks/check_results_geosapi.html)
[![Github_Status_Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Github-0.8-blue.svg)](https://github.com/eblondel/geosapi)
[![DOI](https://zenodo.org/badge/DOI/10.5281/zenodo.1184895.svg)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.1184895)

`geosapi`: GeoServer REST API R Interface

### Citation

We thank in advance people that use `geosapi` for citing it in their
work / publication(s). For this, please use the citation provided at
this link
[![DOI](https://zenodo.org/badge/DOI/10.5281/zenodo.1184895.svg)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.1184895)

### User Manual

A user manual is available at <https://github.com/eblondel/geosapi/wiki>

The R package is also documented through its
[website](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/)

### Sponsors

Many thanks to the following organizations that have provided fundings
for strenghtening the `geosapi` package:

[![](https://unepgrid.ch/themes/grid/assets/dist/images/grid-logo-black-en.svg)](https://unepgrid.ch/en)[![](https://www.fao.org/fileadmin/templates/family-farming-decade/images/FAO-IFAD-Logos/FAO-Logo-EN.svg)](https://www.fao.org/home/en/)
[![](http://www.cnrs.fr/themes/custom/cnrs/logo.svg)](http://www.cnrs.fr)
[![](https://letg.cnrs.fr/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/logo_letg.png)](https://letg.cnrs.fr)

# Package index

## All functions

- [`GSAbstractCoverageStore`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSAbstractCoverageStore.md)
  : Geoserver REST API CoverageStore
- [`GSAbstractDBDataStore`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSAbstractDBDataStore.md)
  : Geoserver REST API AbstractDBDataStore
- [`GSAbstractDataStore`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSAbstractDataStore.md)
  : Geoserver REST API DataStore
- [`GSAbstractStore`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSAbstractStore.md)
  : Geoserver REST API Store
- [`GSAccessControlListManager`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSAccessControlListManager.md)
  : Geoserver REST API Access Control List Manager
- [`GSArcGridCoverageStore`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSArcGridCoverageStore.md)
  : Geoserver REST API ArcGridCoverageStore
- [`GSCoverage`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSCoverage.md)
  : A GeoServer coverage
- [`GSCoverageBand`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSCoverageBand.md)
  : Geoserver REST API GSCoverageBand
- [`GSCoverageStoreManager`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSCoverageStoreManager.md)
  : Geoserver REST API CoverageStore Manager
- [`GSCoverageView`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSCoverageView.md)
  : Geoserver REST API GSCoverageView
- [`GSDataStoreManager`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSDataStoreManager.md)
  : Geoserver REST API DataStore Manager
- [`GSDimension`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSDimension.md)
  : A GeoServer dimension
- [`GSFeatureDimension`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSFeatureDimension.md)
  : A GeoServer dimension
- [`GSFeatureType`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSFeatureType.md)
  : A GeoServer feature type
- [`GSGeoPackageDataStore`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSGeoPackageDataStore.md)
  : Geoserver REST API GeoPackageDataStore
- [`GSGeoTIFFCoverageStore`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSGeoTIFFCoverageStore.md)
  : Geoserver REST API GeoTIFF CoverageStore
- [`GSImageMosaicCoverageStore`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSImageMosaicCoverageStore.md)
  : Geoserver REST API ImageMosaicCoverageStore
- [`GSInputCoverageBand`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSInputCoverageBand.md)
  : Geoserver REST API GSInputCoverageBand
- [`GSLayer`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSLayer.md)
  [`GSStyle`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSLayer.md) :
  A GeoServer layer resource
- [`GSLayerGroup`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSLayerGroup.md)
  : A GeoServer layergroup resource
- [`GSLayerManager`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSLayerManager.md)
  : Geoserver REST API Layer Manager
- [`GSManager`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSManager.md)
  : Geoserver REST API Manager
- [`GSMetadataLink`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSMetadataLink.md)
  : A GeoServer resource metadataLink
- [`GSMonitorManager`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSMonitorManager.md)
  : Geoserver REST API Monitor Manager
- [`GSNamespace`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSNamespace.md)
  : Geoserver REST API Namespace
- [`GSNamespaceManager`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSNamespaceManager.md)
  : Geoserver REST API Namespace Manager
- [`GSOracleNGDataStore`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSOracleNGDataStore.md)
  : Geoserver REST API OracleNGDataStore
- [`GSPostGISDataStore`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSPostGISDataStore.md)
  : Geoserver REST API PostGISDataStore
- [`GSPublishable`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSPublishable.md)
  : A GeoServer layer group publishable
- [`GSRESTEntrySet`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSRESTEntrySet.md)
  : Geoserver REST API XML entry set
- [`GSRESTResource`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSRESTResource.md)
  : Geoserver REST API REST Resource interface
- [`GSResource`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSResource.md)
  : A GeoServer abstract resource
- [`GSServiceManager`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSServiceManager.md)
  : Geoserver REST API Service Manager
- [`GSServiceSettings`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSServiceSettings.md)
  : A GeoServer service settings resource
- [`GSShapefileDataStore`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSShapefileDataStore.md)
  : Geoserver REST API ShapeFileDataStore
- [`GSShapefileDirectoryDataStore`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSShapefileDirectoryDataStore.md)
  : Geoserver REST API ShapeFileDirectoryDataStore
- [`GSShinyMonitor`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSShinyMonitor.md)
  : Geoserver REST API DataStore
- [`GSStyleManager`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSStyleManager.md)
  : Geoserver REST API Style Manager
- [`GSUtils`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSUtils.md) :
  Geoserver REST API Manager Utils
- [`GSVersion`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSVersion.md)
  : A GeoServer version
- [`GSVirtualTable`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSVirtualTable.md)
  : Geoserver REST API GSVirtualTable
- [`GSVirtualTableGeometry`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSVirtualTableGeometry.md)
  : Geoserver REST API GSVirtualTableGeometry
- [`GSVirtualTableParameter`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSVirtualTableParameter.md)
  : Geoserver REST API GSVirtualTableParameter
- [`GSWorkspace`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSWorkspace.md)
  : Geoserver REST API Workspace
- [`GSWorkspaceManager`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSWorkspaceManager.md)
  : Geoserver REST API Workspace Manager
- [`GSWorkspaceSettings`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSWorkspaceSettings.md)
  : Geoserver REST API Workspace Setting
- [`GSWorldImageCoverageStore`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/GSWorldImageCoverageStore.md)
  : Geoserver REST API WorldImageCoverageStore
- [`geosapi`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/geosapi.md)
  [`geosapi-package`](https://eblondel.github.io/geosapi/reference/geosapi.md)
  : GeoServer REST API R Interface
